title: Energy Capsules
description: Our powerful vegan supplement helps boost energy at the cellular level, so you feel naturally invigorated - without the crash. Our pure and powerful formula includes Vitamin B12, L-Theanine and Green Tea.
cleaned_text: Energy Capsules Revive and invigorate your natural energy with a powerful blend of vitamin B12, green tea and L-theanine. Why you'll love it We're fans of coffee, but we also know you need a more sustainable source of energy to conquer the day without the crash, which is why we created our pure and powerful Energy Capsules to help you feel more vibrant. Take 2 capsules daily. Just what you need - Vitamin B12 helps support your cellular energy levels.* - L-Theanine helps support mental focus and alertness.* - Green tea promotes mental alertness.* - Includes a mint tab for freshness.
